name: Fall of the Ninja (WIP)
description:
"Fall of the Ninja" is a casual 2D runner game with a kickass ninja, fighting against oppression. Ninjas hate oppression.

THE DOWNLOAD: contains 2 levels at the moment, its coming along

Features: 

• Fast-paced game play
• No Rage: Lava, Spikes, Unnecessarily Hard Stages
• Free Ninja Comics inside [WIP]
• 2 Languages: English / Spanish [WIP]

Controls (Keybaord)

• Jump: Up Arrow Key
• Slide: Down Arrow Key
• Star Toss - Right Arrow Key
• Action key: Space

Controls (360 Controller)

• Jump - Up DPad
• Slide - Down DPad
• Slide Through Platforms - A
• Star Toss - X
